detaileddescription.para: See ST PM0042, section 3.1 for restrictions on the acceptable value of wait_states for a given SYSCLK configuration.

parameterdescription.para: number of wait states (one of FLASH_WAIT_STATE_0, FLASH_WAIT_STATE_1, FLASH_WAIT_STATE_2).

briefdescription.para: STM32 Medium and high density Flash register map and setup routines.
